MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD14 postcode area of Eyemouth. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.30am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a complex repair on underground cable located at Crosslaw Caravan Park and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank your for your patience. This message was updated at 2.09pm on Tuesday 8th December 2020.
